# Improved Rapid Shot (Feat)
## Overview
You are an expert at firing weapons with exceptional speed.

**Prerequisites:** [[Manyshot (Feat)|Manyshot]], [[Point-Blank Shot (Feat)|Point Blank Shot]], [[Rapid Shot (Feat)|Rapid Shot]].

**Benefit:** When using the [[Rapid Shot (Feat)|Rapid Shot]] feat, you may ignore the –2 penalty on all your ranged attack rolls.

**Special:** A fighter may select Improved Rapid Shot as one of his fighter bonus feats.

**Source:** Complete Warrior (WotC)­, pg. 101
